Title: 01 - Building a Flexable Shape Object Model
Description: Replicate most of Visio shapeSheet functionality in a C# object model

Samples.Title: Javascript framework used to dynamically create a shape model
Shape models need to be able to track parent / child relationships
Samples.Notes: Lessons: hard to serialize if there is a circular reference:  Funct vs Property

Samples.Title: There are many different types of shapes with different properties and behaviors
What is the best way to keep track of all the different types shapes?
Question:  Create SlotGroups?
Samples.Notes: Informed by the Visio shapesheet, Learned over time to create a dynamically extensable object

Samples.Title: Focus on making SlotGroups are easy to use
This is the current interface for the shape model
For this implementation, Slots are the solution to manage the shape data model
